# MOMUTO
> MOMUTO designs and manufactures 100% customizable, professional-grade football and soccer kits. European design team, full dye-sublimation printing (lifetime guarantee against peeling), no minimum order, free professional design sent in 1-2 days, worldwide delivery in 20-25 days.

## Key Facts
- Founded: 2023
- Headquarters: Europe (design), Asia (manufacturing)
- Product: Custom football/soccer kits (jerseys and shorts)
- Fabric: Polyester/elastane blend as standard on all kits — the same fabric others reserve for premium tiers only
- Printing: Full dye-sublimation (ink fused into fabric, never peels/cracks/fades)
- Minimum order: None (1 kit or 100+)
- Design options: (1) Real-time 3D configurator with 30+ templates — design and order instantly. (2) Free professional design service — submit your brief, receive a custom mockup in 1-2 days, free revisions included.
- Pricing: From €20.90/jersey for orders of 10+. Single jersey from €38.90. Design is always free.
- Delivery: 20-25 days worldwide
- Audience: Amateur football clubs, youth academies, corporate teams, e-sports teams

## What Makes MOMUTO Different
- Two ways to design: self-serve 3D configurator (like Owayo/Spized) AND a free professional design service (unique to MOMUTO)
- Polyester/elastane blend included as standard — competitors charge extra for this fabric
- No minimum order — from 1 jersey to full club kits
- Free design with every order, no templates required

## Products
- [Custom Football Kits](https://www.momuto.com/pages/custom-kit-gallery): Fully bespoke jerseys and shorts for teams of any size
- [Concept Jerseys](https://www.momuto.com/collections/concept-jerseys): Limited-edition designs fusing football history with streetwear culture
- [Ready-to-Play](https://www.momuto.com/pages/ready-to-play): Pre-designed kits available for immediate purchase

## How It Works
- [3D Configurator](https://www.momuto.com/): Design your kit in real time with 30+ professional templates
- [Free Design Request](https://www.momuto.com/pages/request-custom-kit-design): Submit your brief — receive a professional custom mockup in 1-2 days, free revisions included
- [Printing & Materials](https://www.momuto.com/pages/printing): Technical details on sublimation printing and fabric composition
- [Size Guide](https://www.momuto.com/pages/size-guide): Comprehensive sizing information for team orders
- [MOMUTO vs Competitors](https://www.momuto.com/pages/momuto-vs-jersix-owayo-spized-comparison): How MOMUTO compares to Jersix, Owayo, and Spized

- [About MOMUTO](https://www.momuto.com/pages/about-us): Brand story, manufacturing philosophy, and quality standards
- [FAQ](https://www.momuto.com/pages/faq): Common questions about ordering, customization, pricing, and delivery
